meanings.definition: Able to be found or uncovered.
meanings.sent1: The hidden treasure was easily discoverable by the explorers.
meanings.sent2: The map made the buried treasure discoverable to the pirates.
meanings.sent3: The discoverable secret of the old house was finally revealed during the renovation.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for painting was discoverable like a hidden gem waiting to be unearthed.
meanings.sent5: The discoverable footprints in the sand led the detective to the missing person.

meanings.definition: Capable of being revealed or brought to light.
meanings.sent1: The truth behind the mystery was finally discoverable after years of investigation.
meanings.sent2: The hidden message in the letter was easily discoverable with a special light.
meanings.sent3: The discoverable clue in the case made the detective's job much easier.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions were discoverable through the expressive art she created.
meanings.sent5: The discoverable evidence in the case pointed directly to the culprit.
